body.p: How much energy is stored in 1 gram of glucose? (The molecular mass of glucose is 180 g/mol.)

explanation.p: 673 kcal/mol divided by 180 g/mol equals 3.7 kcal/g, approximately 4 kcal/g. Does this number look familiar? Food labels list sugar content in grams and calories per serving of food. For sugars, the conversion is 4 kilocalories per gram.
